mapper.select: SELECT L.LOGID, M.USERNAME, L.TRANSNAME, L.TRANSTIME, L.REMOTEIP, L.STATUS FROM FSMUSERLOG L LEFT JOIN FSMUSER M ON M.USERID = L.USERID WHERE L.USERID=#{userId} AND TRANSTIME BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY TRANSTIME DESC LIMIT #{start},#{length}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM FSMUSERLOG L LEFT JOIN FSMUSER M ON M.USERID = L.USERID WHERE L.USERID=#{userId} AND TRANSTIME between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} ORDER BY TRANSTIME DESC
